42688378405051.name: Smarties Necklaces Candy - Wrapped 100ct
42688378405051.desc: No kid can resist candy and candy that you wear around your neck is too much for anyone. It works like a power pack of goodness. The candy necklace just sits around your neck until you need a boost of candy goodness then you just take a bit and you're good for awhile. Not only do they provide quick energy but they are quite attractive as well. They come in all colors and go with just about any outfit. Candy is always in style and brings smiles to the faces of all people.

42688378208443.name: Candy Necklaces - Unwrapped 100ct
42688378208443.desc: Show me a kid and I will show you someone that loves candy necklaces. There is just something about colorful jewelry that you can eat that puts a smile on everyone's face. First there is the color of the candy necklace the entire rainbow of the spectrum in represented and each color has a unique and delicious taste. One bite can be grape the next can be orange. All kids love variety and this is one of the best kind. Candy necklaces also provide a whole lot of convenience because it is worn around the neck and it is a very short tug to pull a necklace to your mouth and crunch a little bit of candy goodness. It is a lot like carrying a snack to power you through the day. When you need a burst of sugar just take a bite, until it is gone. These treats are great for parties of any kind and all kids just simply love to wear and eat candy necklaces!

42688560955579.name: PEZ Disney Princess Assortment - 12ct
42688560955579.desc: Relive the magic and wonder of classic Disney films with our assorted Disney princess Pez dispensers! This is a must-have for fans, collectors and anyone with children. Each box includes eye-catching art featuring all your favorite Disney ladies. Every dispenser is individually wrapped along with some starter Pez so children can use their new candy toy as soon as they open the package. Disney princess Pez dispensers are a convenient way to fill treat bags at princess themed parties. Add them to Christmas stockings, Easter baskets or gifts. Each bulk Disney princess Pez dispenser box contains a variety of characters from many renowned animated movies. You'll see the smiling faces of Cinderella, Belle, Jasmine, Ariel, Aurora and Snow White! Everyone loves the sweet taste of Pez candy, especially when they can enjoy it along with their favorite Disney princess! Our bulk Pez dispensers are also a great choice for school activities, community events and family gatherings.

42688453279931.name: Flash Pop Rings - 24ct
42688453279931.desc: Flash Pop rings are one of the most amazing confections available! Children won't be able to resist the allure of this glowing accessory! Each piece is wearable and edible. It begins with a plastic base that includes a ring that fits over most fingers. The top supports a cylinder shaped length of hard candy in green apple, lemon or strawberry flavors. As if the temptation of sugar wasn't enough, Flash Pop rings take it a step further with a flashing light hidden inside the candy, creating a fun light. Each novelty candy arrives packaged individually with a plastic dome. Children will love choosing green, blue, yellow or red even more when they see these lollipop style ring pops light up! Flash Pops will make birthday treat bags even more exciting or can be used as stocking stuffers, Easter basket filler or a unique after school snack. Make children smile with wearable hard candy that lights up!
